info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 27 at 9:41PM MDT until July 28 at 12:45AM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
* WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...A portion of western Texas, including the following county, El Paso.
* WHEN...Until 1245 AM MDT.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 939 PM MDT, Public reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Up to 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Flooding impacts will continue into the overnight due to standing water in isolated areas, but no additional rainfall is expected. Avoid the area around Interstate 10 and Missouri Avenue. - Some locations that may experience flooding include... West El Paso and Central El Paso. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM MDT MONDAY
